caption: Great place. Good beer and Pretzels.
Great beer, great service, great bar food. Lots of specials, events, and frequent beer releases. 100% recommended, especially for outdoor seating during (and, eventually, after) covid.

My boyfriend and I happened upon this place while traveling, and we were SO THRILLED! Such a relaxed, comfortable atmosphere. Our server, Jaime, was fantastic. He was kind, attentive, knowledgeable, and gave great beer recommendations! All of the staff was friendly and warm and receptive. I left with so much beer to take home and I can’t wait to crack open a can of my Unicycle Vigilante. Can’t recommend this place enough!
Friendly folks and yummy beer!

Excellent selection of beers, particularly saisons, stouts, and IPAs. The enormous beer garden with a few fire pits, and spacious interior welcome many. Location at Silver Spring Metro Station and near public parking garages makes it easy to visit. Do check it out, if you haven't! My wife and I just went there today 3/3/2021 for the brewery's 2nd birthday, and we're so glad it made it through the worst of the pandemic with many of us supporting it and other neighboring businesses through this rough stretch. Cheers! To your health!

Came to enjoy some drinks and snacks outdoors at Silver Branch. Melinda started the outdoor fireplace for us and helped us pick out a bunch of beers to try! She was super friendly and accommodating with all of our questions about the menu. We found it very safe regarding covid restrictions and had a great time!!! Thanks!!
I love this place. The food is great, the beer is delicious, the staff is so friendly, and the atmosphere is chill. I can’t recommend it enough.

Solid space, solid beer. Real biergarten in the city feel. Always a large selection of beers with something new to try. Staff is great and informative. Also it's dog friendly outside. I've never been disappointed. Plus they make a mean pretzel

The beer is amazing and constantly changing.  The food is delicious, we just had the tamales, which were wonderful. Plus the outdoor patio is huge and very pleasant. It's also near a parking garage and the metro. Higgly recommend

I LOVE Silver Branch. A not so hidden gem, great beer, great staff, great atmosphere and great food! They also have a monthly subscription and they'll hook you up with a free six pack a month and a discount on purchases. that is a good value if you find yourself buying lots of beer from them, which you will if you like good beer! I like the Abbey Single, Beyond the Gnome World, and the Gilded Age. Can't go wrong here really.
They strike a perfect balance between classic and esoteric beer styles. Excellent quality and the staff are the friendliest.
Best brewery in Silver Spring
Fantastic outdoor patio and beers (lost of variety). One of my favorite breweries.
The service is always great here. Amazing rotating selection and best prices around. Will definitely keep coming back.

Such an amazing combination of service and flavor. Malinda answered every question we had about their brews and even provided us with other local suggestions. Exceptionally, before we made it back to Silver Branch to claim my phone that I left on the table, she had already taken off to deliver it to our next stop. Outstanding!  I prefer malty beers, but order pilsners to gauge the brewer's skills. Their pilsners were clean and crisp, no off flavors. Their stout was solid and the variations upon it were well balanced to highlight the original and not overwhelm your palate. Even their gose impressed. Great bar food too.  We spent five nights in the area, visiting many breweries. Every style that we tried here was the best example on our trip. This is the only brewery that made us want to bring beer home to Asheville, NC. Start and end your DC beer tour here.

Stellar lineup of great beer and even better service. Malinda is simply THE BEST. From pilsners to Belgians to goses to a variety of stouts - come for the beer, stay for the service. Best brewery in the DC area.
Good beer and nice atmosphere.  Down the street from the metro. COV 19 approval.
One of the best daft beer in the world
Great beer, informed wait staff - well worth a visit!

Silver Branch Brewing Company has quickly become a vital part of the downtown Silver Spring area. Yeah their beer is great, yeah their employees are fantastic and truly care about their products and service but it truly is so much more than that. Right when the COVID 19 lockdown started Silver Branch was the ONLY place around I could find flour or yeast for quite some time and let's be real there's not a huge profit margin there. However, they did it because they had a resource they could provide to the community.  This place continues to adapt, to try new things, to be different, and not just with their beer. They collaborate with the local community, listen to feedback, and step their game up every day. You'll find they regularly host resident chefs for special themed food nights. Last year for the Holiday season they brought in some amazing local makers and vendors for a pop up holiday market. They regularly rotate out art in their taproom to showcase new artists. In their COVID response they expanded their outdoor seating, popped open the garage door out front for walk up take out, and even asked me if I wanted my credit card disinfected before returning it to me. The newer cocktails they've been experimenting with (available in takeout kits) are amazing. The Pink Guava Margarita over the summer was a personal favorite of mine.  But of course you're here for the beer right? I haven't forgotten, that's amazing too (obviously). Nearly every time they have a new release I'm there. Even when the food service industry struggles in the world that is 2020 Silver Branch still have had several releases this year that donated to some amazing causes. Their Black is Beautiful Black IPA was not only delicious but the proceeds benefited The Sentencing Project. Yeah this is a long review, but this place does a lot. TL;DR Silver Branch is amazing all around
Always a good time.  Love this place.  Great consistent beer.   Great urban setting.  Thanks guys!
Huge patio with lots is space for outdoor beer drinking. This is the place for Covid drinking. Beer is great, too. I loved the Chronicle Stout.
Really good beers and pretzels!

One of my favorite places to go to in Maryland. I wish Silver Branch was around when I was younger. Great place to just chill with friends, play board games, and enjoy great beer. The staff is always very welcoming and are always down to answer any beer questions you have. If you haven’t been yet I definitely recommend stopping by.

This place is amazing! The staff is always friendly and welcoming, the food is delicious and the drinks are great! I love the outdoor seating they have in accommodation to the pandemic. They also have beers for sale if you wanted to take them home to enjoy later. I definitely recommend Silver Branch!

Silver Branch is right across the street from our apartment and since the day it opened it has always been our favorite brewery in the area! The staff is ultra nice and extremely knowledgeable. There is always a new style beer to try and they absolutely nail it! During the pandemic they adapted quickly and professionally, opening up their garage doors for carry out orders and allowing online ordering. They have since opened their outdoor areas and ensured every Covid-19 precaution was being taken, especially during their Oktoberfest celebrations. They’ve built a strong connection with the community from the get-go, anyone who walks through the door is an instant regular. Love this brewery, excited for what they brew up next!

This is one of the best brewery’s in the DMV area! I love that there is indoor as well as outdoor seating. The staff is always great and super friendly. There is a great variety of of beers and there is also delicious cocktails. You even have the option to take beer and drinks to go. I highly suggest you visit Silver Branch!

My partner and I moved a one year ago and Silver Branch Brewing is one of the first places we went to and the brewery has been a staple to the Silver Spring community and our daily routines ever since!  The immediate welcome we receive by either Malinda, Lily, Miles, or Patrick and many others is nothing short of familiar. Seeing both of the owners, Christian and Brett work alongside the staff is an example of the care and love they put into their business.  If my friends have a bad day, it's Silver Branch. If we're celebrating a birthday, it's Silver Branch. If we want to show our visiting family and friends what Silver Spring has to offer, it's Silver Branch.  The beer is excellent and rotates regularly to match the season. The food offerings, although small (remember, the specialty is their beer!), always hit the spot and are delicious!  Thank you to the staff at Silver Branch for always being attentive, inclusive, and open for a great time!

After a year of living in Downtown Silver Spring, going to Silver Branch truly feels like coming home. The staff and overall vibes of the brewery exude fun-loving and familial. With delicious beer, cocktails, food and good times, there really is no better place to be after work and on weekends. And with the bonus of Trivia Wednesdays with Adam, I know my crew will continue to make Silver Branch our weekly meeting spot. HIGHLY recommend 11/10, Cheers!

Look, where to begin...if you've haven't been to Silver Branch then you don't know what you are missing. This brewery has been open for less than 1&1/2 years and it's by far my favorite brewery in the ENTIRE DC metro region, full stop. SB has the nicest staff & the BEST beer around. Also for all those posting negative reviews in 2020, give them a break IT IS 2020. I can say I have not felt safer at any other venue during the pandemic like I do at SB. If you like great beer, good people and good vibes then Silver Branch is for you.
The buffalo Mac is very disgusting, the food was very cold. All the drinks are “homemade” and not very tasty, nice place to sit down and relax and take in the fresh air after a long day though.
Ample outdoor setting available.  Large variety of beers.
Great people, awesome beer and food. Always a good time.
Yummy
Nice beer selection love it!
Silver Branch was AWESOME!

Always have a wonderful experience here. The staff are all so personable and really build a relationship with their regulars. The place is busy most of the time, but that’s only because it is so good. The beer is tasty and the food is delicious.  It’s worth noting that they have done such an amazing job adapting to covid, starting up carryout and delivery services, and social distancing across the patio.  Easily my go to place for years to come!
Great service, great beer and good grub!
Great food and beer. Impressive social distancing and sanitation. Excellent place for friends or families to spend a summer afternoon!

Server touched and literally scrolled my phone for me to help me navigate the terrible website they operate on, and instead of limiting points of contact for their guests, they prioritize haste - we had more than 5 different people come to our table with drinks and food, and without gloves.
Great space and friendly staff, good selection of rotating taps plus cocktails and food

This place is such a gem - I live a 5 minute walk away which is simultaneously a blessing and curse. I've never been disappointed by any of their rotating selections. The 'beyond the gnome world' is probably the best beer I've ever had.
Fantastic local brewery offering a wide selection of very good beers. I am a big fan of the Squeegee Master sour and Umlaut Love kolsch (pictured).

Great beer. Friendly service. Excellent set up for social distancing. Awesome atmosphere. My wife & I went and had an enjoyable time. All the beer we tried was divine and the staff is wonderfully passionate about the beer. They shared stories about the beer collaborations and what the brewery is doing during Covid. We look forward to returning and enjoying more great beer.
Good food at reasonable prices. Excellent beer.
In a difficult situation (the pandemic), they are safe and sensible and still friendly and helpful. Good work in tough times! Bier Garten is positively pleasant.
Waited for 30 mins while we tried to download the app that you have to order on. Waiter never came to the table. We left.
Good food, great beer in a safe and inviting atmosphere.

COVID review. Pick up was easy and painless. They helped me order a large 50lb of King Arthur Lancelot flour for my home bread baking. For their troubles, I purchased 4 six packs of beer (their choice) as well. I marveled at their interior and hope to frequent them later as shut down wanes. I've tried all four beers and was duly impressed. All of them were 'sweet' tasting without having a 'sugary' direction. My wife who typically abhors beers actually like 3 of the 4 (stout was never liked but she tolerated theirs). I like Guinness, shiner bock and so their Chronicale: Foreign Extra Stout I particularly liked. The other 3 had great floral/fruity flavors that I was amazed to find in these beers. Very smooth, and if you want more bubbles, pour into a glass. Straight out of the cans, it can taste almost flat (which oddly is my preference).  Scared Table:Abbey Single-amazing and i liked the honeyed notes. Glass Castle: Pilsener. I usually don't like Pilseners, but this one was tasty. Quantum shift: east coast IPA. not as 'hoppy' as i was expecting but that was in a good way as some IPAs are way too 'hoppy' for me. if you like more floral/fruity IPAs without so much face forward hop...this will be a new favorite of yours.  super nice people working there who smile and are friendly. support local businesses!!!

In this uncertain time you can still pick up some great beer from Silver Branch brewing. I got a six pack of the Coffee Chronicle coffee stout, have tried the tropical stout. They have IPA and lagers too. All you have to do is step in the door, pull a six pack from the fridge and pay the bartender who is wearing gloves. 💙 and the hand sanitizer is right there. So easy I can't wait until we can hang out and enjoy the patio after the crisis. Friends helping friends.

Massive and open space, so feel free to bring a group! They provide bar and table service which is nice. I also like how they have a bottomless popcorn option along with some other good snacks to choose from. Most importantly, the beer was really good!
Very attentive staff and great beers! Love that they have such a large selection of traditional beers. Full Tweed Jacket was my favorite, but the czech pils is great too!

Friend and I went here last night and loved the place. Great atmosphere, quality drinks, and amazing service! Lillie took great care of us and was very knowledgeable about all of the drinks on the menu! Wonderful spot and fantastic server, will be coming here again.

A group of us went in on a Thursday evening to find the place absolutely packed. We were struggling to find a place for us to gather, but then a server noticed us and asked if we needed help. He ended up going into the back and getting a whole new table with benches for us to use. It was perfect, and they really went above and beyond to make us comfortable.  Also the beer is great. 10/10 would go again.

We had such a wonderful experience at this brewery! Candice was so attentive and took care of our orders quickly and with a smile. We liked the pretzels and really enjoyed the Silver Century beer.  I hope they never change it -- that's my favorite. The place is bright, can handle large parties as well as individuals, and the staff keeps it clean. We hope to stop by again soon.
Beer 101: Origin of Beer Styles Very informative with great beers. 15 bucks

Love, love, love. Great staff, great space/atmosphere, and really great beer.  It's hard to believe how young of a place they are. Their brewed beer list is long and so delicious. I tried 8 beers and enjoyed every one of them (especially Metro Gnome and Sacred Table). Highly recommend.

Melinda, Melinda, Melinda!!! A real industry professional. When I first walked in I wasn’t impressed with the service in the slightest. After our first round Melinda started taking care of our table of 6 and it completely changed our experience at silver branch. Will definitely be back! Try the squeegee master

From the moment I walked in with my husband, I was amazed at how amazing this place looks! The people are fantastic and the vibe is pretty good too! Love the beverages and the food options, definitely a place to check out if your in the Silver Spring, MD area.

I live around the corner from Silver Branch and this is one of my favorite places to bring friends and family. The atmosphere is great, customer service is excellent, and there's a good variety of drink options.  In addition, management really seems to care about the customer's experience. Malinda helped me with buying tickets to their New Years Eve party after there were some glitches with the Eventbrite website. She was proactive in reaching out to me until the problem was fixed and let the people at the front door know about the situation so there were no issues when we arrived for the party.

A large group of us swung by here on a Sunday afternoon and were so pleasantly surprised to find that it was filled with people, but not so crowded that we couldn't find seats. Having a wine and cocktail menu, with the wine from grapes from the same region as the hops they use, was already a nice touch but personally I loved that they had so many options for beer pours! They serve 1/4 pint, half pint, and full of every beer they have which makes it so easy to do less than a full flight but still get to taste different beers. They've got at least one of every beer you'd want to try and their IPAs and stouts in particular were very good.  Between indoor and outdoor seating they easily seat over 100 people, and from the looks of it they allow you to bring your own food which I think is a must for breweries in this day and age, but since there's ample space it's an actually good spot for a party. They also have board games and cornhole so you'll want to stick around!
Free refills. Great Customer service!
I had an extraordinary time at this spot. We liked the fantastic vibes and the menu. The staff members were very friendly. I am happy we finally decided to visit this place.

First time here and amazing service! The place was PACKED for happy hour. I was so fortunate to have Christine served me at the bar! She was extremely kind and courteous, explaining all their specials. Nice to know there are still kind people! :*
Cool place to get a quick bite or have a glass of beer that gets brewed locally. The food tastes really good and the beer is awesome ❤

Right near the Metro, the staff here was very friendly and helpful and the atmosphere was pleasant with a relaxed music selection and lots of windows. The brewery also has a large patio when the weather is nice. The beers are pretty average, with a few standouts (we liked the Squeegee Master and the Nth Degree, but results may vary).

Love this place! My favorite brewery in Maryland. The brews were incredible. Highly recommend Nth Degree (IPA) and Coffee Chronicle (Stout). All I can say is good thing I don't live in SS or I'd go broke from being here all the time.

If you appreciate beer in all its variations, Silver Branch should be a destination. Steps away from the Silver Spring metro station, this spacious brewery has attentive staff, outstanding beer and reasonable food choices. Go and try the milky version of Glass Castles, probably the most authentic Pilsner this side of Prague.

They brew a wide variety of beers, and always have something on tap for everyone.  The staff here is great and they have plenty seating and a nice patio.  This is a great place to go if you like enjoying beer in a friendly atmosphere.

Awesome service from the moment I walked in. Staff was super friendly and knowledgeable. I couldn’t decide on the beers so they brought me a flight. All very unique and tasty! Spent a couple hours chatting, playing a couple of their games and sipping on great beer. Definitely a fun chill evening. Will be coming back!
This place rocks! Beers taste good and they have fusbol. Cant complain.
Great service, great beer, comfortable atmosphere. Excellent host and costumer service. The bar tender goes out of her way to answer your beer questions with keen suggestions. She knows her thing.

I had an amazing time, the selection of the silver branch brewer was so wide! I loved the amazing customer service that I received from one of that managers. They really went above and beyond to make my experience memorable. I will def be back with my friends real soon!!

Giving this place one star for a host of reasons, I really wanted to love it.  Pros: location, decent beer cons: poor service  - wait staff fumbled service and was rude, "soft pretzels" that were cold and hard, was over charged.  I will not be back.

Excellent place to grab early morning coffee in the mornings on the way into metro or the office in the Downtown Silver Spring area. Phenomenal tasting Craft in house brewed beers with stellar service.
Great place to meet up for happy hours after work! Solid beers! Would love some more food options, but overall, great addition to the area.

Spacious! All the drinks and food we ordered were good. I don't drink and there was a hibiscus juice situation that was a delight. Service was fast and friendly; they use handheld mobile devices that seem to work well. There was an area full of board games, and a foosball table. The bench seating outside got uncomfortable after a while so we moved inside to some much comfier seats with no problem. Can't wait to come back!
This is a fabulous neighborhood bar and I can recommend this place 100%.
This brewery has great beer. A good variety and every one that I tried was perfect. The service was great and the staff knew the beer well. Really enjoyed my experience at Silver Branch Brewery!
Dude - as manager you can't tell patrons they're not tipping enough. And from what I have seen this place does not constitute 20%. Popcorn and franks don't constitute food.
I love this place. They have a great variety of beers in many styles that are brewed on premises. It’s also a great place to spend hours hanging out and talking or playing games.
I love this place.  They did a good job with decor, good beers, sparkling clean and new
Love everything about this place!
Best beer in Silver Spring. Great atmosphere
Excellent place for great beer!!
Great new spot.  Definitely will be back.  Liked wine selection, great happy hour, and beer garden was great given the moderate temps last night.
I really like this place. Their happy hour is great. They have a great selection of beers and even serce mixed drinks. Unlimited popcorn is a must. They have a futsal table inside which is fun.

Utterly brilliant. I am so pleased this place has opened. Its right by the metro and has variations of several beers. Great indoor seating but they have an outdoor beer garden too . I like sitting in both and am enjoying the beers a lot. The atmosphere at the bar is nice too. This will be my goto bar going forward I have a feeling! Hidden gem.
Great space and awesome popcorn! Dog and family friendly :) you are welcome to order food from elsewhere and bring it to eat here.

Casual, cool local brewery a short walk from the Silver Spring Red Line Metro Station. Lots of tasty beer to choose from and there's even wine, cider and cocktails for folks who don't do beer. Some outdoor seating during nice weather.
Great beer and great atmosphere. If your first time, get a flight of the 4 flagship beers.
Great place to hangout! They have good beer collection!
Ok but they need freaking FOOD!!!!!
The Czech pils is superb! Great space, great service.
Great beers, great space, nice folks!

Interesting beer assortment, reasonable prices, friendly staff, lively but not overwhelmingly loud patrons, nice space, convenient location. Everything you want from a neighborhood joint. Will be back.
Fun atmosphere, beer very good
Great staff, supreme location, good beer. Looking forward to what they have in store for the future
Great service and great options for everyone

Silver Branch is a wonderful addition to the craft brew/burgeoning brewery scene in Silver Spring. Not only do they feature delicious brews (Witbiers, IPA, English ales, and Ciders), but their cocktails are delicious (REAL tonic made on premises!) and they have a very nice wine selection. Centrally located near the Silver Spring metro and featuring outdoor seating, this is the happy hour and night out destination!
Light and airy space. Has a games area. Great beers! Full cocktail menu and you can bring carryout food to have with your beer.
Great space. Good beer. Very friendly service. When weather gets nice they will have a huge outdoor space too.
Great atmosphere, excellent beer, great location.

This is a great new brewery. They have a few table games (Janga, Connect Four, Deck of Cards) and floor games (Bag-O/Cornhole and foosball). And the best item on their menu, for bar food, is the endless popcorn for $5. They offer salt, pepper, and old bay and will bring new bowls out until you leave. I’ll have to go back to try their other menu items.
Excellent. Nice atmosphere for microbrewery.  Service slightly slow but wor th the wait
Nice that Silver Spring has additional breweries to choose from. Atmosphere is awesome but beers are sub-par. Staff is great.
Another yuppie beer place...convenient but only so-so beer.... High rent district so the beer is overpriced.... sorry folks

My husband and I went for the first time tonight, and it was packed! Really nice space with a good vibe and there is a section with games. My husband loved his beer (Ruby Dragon or something like that) and they have options to get 1/4 pint as well if you want a few small samples. They serve wine and mixed drinks as well. Excellent customer service and very friendly, attentive servers!
Awesome beers, great staff.

Nice variety of beers.  They've got something for everyone.  Very chill space for hanging out with friends and family.  As some others have mentioned, if you are planning to eat there you'll want to bring your own food or order delivery from somewhere nearby.  Lots of delivery options in Silver Spring to choose from.

Great beers, amazing staff and excellent space. They even have a cask ale, a nice little treat. Overall their beers (and ambiance) are between Denizens and Astro in style, more complex then Astro, but not as overcomplicated as Denizens. I really have to give it to the brewmaster, they've done a fantastic job balancing nailing the basics with incorporating depth to their beers.
Awesome place. Close to work, with great beers and great people. Come join us.

Nice space in Downtown Silver Spring, good selection of there and other local breweries beer as they build there selection.  Really enjoyed their Hazy IPA.  Great service, limited food menu.  Excellent potential.
Great brewery right by the metro! Awesome beer!

This is feedback not criticism. I went there at a busy time. Unlimited popcorn is made in a tiny machine that belongs on a personal kitchen. There was a person dedicated to making popcorn for the whole venue. Not a very good use of that person's time, especially when the bar and tables needed tending. Something to rethink. Also, not enough beer menus at the bar and tables. This is after all a brewery. The bar was unattended (afternoon of 3/9). You had to yell at the waiters for attention because there were so busy serving the tables. It took about 10 min for everyone sitting at the bar to get somebody's attention. No complain about service once achieved. Finally, having a cocktail menu is nice but it takes so long for waiters to prepare them that it slows down the whole place. I felt that the place was understaffed for a busy time but I understand there is a learning curve. I plan to go back and I hope the feedback is useful.

I’m so happy that Silver Branch has finally opened!  I love that it’s such a versatile environment; I can stop in for some coffee and work on my laptop, or go in a little later for some beers and a game of cornhole. I love the fact that you can bring your own food or order in with doordash or ubereats. The staff is super friendly, they even gave my friends and I a quick peak at the back brewery where all the magic happens. I will definitely be back and encourage everyone else to experience it for themselves!

We stopped by the night before the grand opening. Great spot right next to Silver Spring Station. We had a blast. Good beer. We tasted all of them. Friendly staff. They thanked us for supporting them. It's very open and family friendly. Welcome addition to Downtown Silver Spring.

This is about to be the go-to brewery for downtown Silver Spring.  The beer is way better than all the other places, and the prices are slightly less.  Plus, it is literally right next to the metro, so have that extra beer before heading out.  The Chronicle stout is by far the tastiest stout I've ever had.  This place is also very large with plenty of seating and you don't have to yell across the table to have a decent conversation.
Went to the grand opening and had a great time! Great service and beer! The co owner Brett even took time to sit with us and chat! Amazing atmosphere and a fun place to go with friends!
Silver Branch is a beautiful space with friendly staff and its located right next to the metro. If you're an IPA fan, I highly recommend the Quantum Shift!

Service was okay and drinks were good but when you choose to close your tab you really have to pay close attention because you can easily miss the tip button ( I almost did!) Our good friend missed this option after several drinks (shocker!) and the manager/owner Bret approached us about it in a very unprofessional manner which made our friend and all of our group feel very uncomfortable. It was an honest mistake. He didn't even give our friend the benefit of the doubt. There's a way to approach these types of situations especially as an owner having opened a new business and he did a poor job of this. Next time don't assume the worse about your customers your approach to these situations means EVERYTHING. I've never felt this uncomfortable in my life so for this I'm not coming back. Sorry not sorry!

Drinks were great however Bret the manger decided to call us out on the amount we decided to tip. Which made us feel uncomfortable. I’m sorry you chose to pay your waiters $4 an hour even though they deserve more. The staff was amazing!!!
Great beer and fun people working the bar! It's a shame they don't have heavy food, but we love the experimentation and styles of beer they make

It's so wonderful to have this amazing brewery in Silver Spring, and just steps from the Metro! I have been consistently impressed with their beer after trying it at various festivals and events throughout the area for the last several months. I loved at the brewery also has homemade sodas as well as tea and coffee. The space is absolutely phenomenal and the owners and staff are incredibly welcoming.  I look forward to enjoying many beverages here!
Great spot, great location, great beers.

Cold open for this new microbrewery with a reputation that precedes it.  Great space, good beer decent service, but no real food or plans for it.  I know it is all about the beer but $6 beef jerky? Child please.
Excellent beer, excited for more of their in house brands! Owner was awesome and even gave a bunch of us a tour of the facilities

Went to their soft open tonight. The selection of beers they have is just starting, most of it is in collaboration with other nearby brewers since their facilities weren't operating. You can tell by the number of taps that they expect to have quite a variety though!  One thing I love is that they are going to offer four cask conditioned ales, with the traditional pump since they're not artificially carbonated. It's a little less expensive to buy them vs the same beer carbonated since they want to move them. (Cask conditioned ales need to be sold quickly because they're exposed to air.)  Prices are reasonable compared to the other breweries nearby. The bar is relatively small but there are a lot of tables. Food selection is pretty lean (at least at the moment) but you've got Silver Spring in the area if you want good food. I'm a bit surprised they went with Men/Women restrooms rather than gender-neutral ones.
Very good experience
A very cool space, and a wide variety of nice beers.  And super Metro convenient.
